title: Trivia Challenge App
description: Full stack trivia challenge application that allows users to answer questions in a variety of categories and difficulties. Users can create accounts and save their progress.

title: FPS Simulation In Console
description: The game renders a 3D environment using ASCII characters and allows the player to navigate through a map.

title: Donut in C++
description: A 3D spinning donut in Terminal implemented in C++ for Windows.

title: Conway's Game of Life
description: A simulation of Conway's Game of Life. Users can create their own patterns and adjust the speed of the simulation. Implemented in pure JS!

title: Doppler Effect Simulator
description: A simulation of the Doppler Effect implemented in Python during my internship in Georgia Tech.

title: Spring Force Simulation
description: In-browser simulation of a spring force implemented using pure JS.

title: Video To ASCII
description: Converts a video to ASCII art in real-time using pure JS.
